title: The Geopolitics Of AI Chips Will Define The Future Of AI

title: Elon Musk Talking With Tucker Carlson About Working Together: Report
description: Elon Musk has been talking with former Fox News host Tucker Carlson about possibly working together, according to a new report from Axios. The news comes after Carlson was abruptly pulled off the air by Fox, despite hosting the most popular cable news show in the U.S.

title: Sharks Might Not Thrive In Cold Water Because Of This.
description: Researchers have found that bony fish have a higher metabolic rate in cold temperatures than sharks and rays.

title: Five Months After Cancellation, ‘Warrior Nun’ Fans Won’t Give Up On Season 3
description: There are fandoms, and there are fandoms, and in all my years of doing this, I’m not sure I’ve ever seen anything quite like Warrior Nun fans Warrior Nun was a series on Netflix that you may not have watched due to its odd name...

title: Minus Its Unfortunate Performance, ‘Jedi: Survivor’ Is Incredible
description: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor is an incredible game. One that is as close to a perfect Star Wars experience so far as I could want about 12 hours in, minus the deeply frustrating performance issues on both PC and console.

title: The Easiest 'Destiny 2' Platinum Medals And Platinum Nightfalls You'll Ever Get
description: Thanks to the relative strength of one Destiny 2 weapon type, one amazing artifact mod and the way this medal scoring works, you can simultaneously get guaranteed platinum medals through a bounty and a platinum finish for the Competitive Nightfall essentially every single time.

title: But ‘Starfield’ Is Going To Be Good, Right?
description: After Redfall, is Starfield actually going to deliver for Xbox? Through it all, I still believe it will.

title: Apparently ‘The Rings Of Power’ Doesn’t Need Writers Or Showrunners To Finish Filming Season 2
description: Amazon’s big-budget Lord Of The Rings show The Rings Of Power is carrying on with filming on Season 2 despite the Hollywood writer’s strike that has caused numerous other productions to pause while the WGA hashes out terms with production studios.

title: Netflix’s ‘Stranger Things’ Season 5 Will Be Delayed Because Of The Writers Strike
description: While HBO’s House of the Dragon is reportedly script-ready and good to go, Netflix’s crown jewel, Stranger Things, will delay season 5 due to the writer’s strike. The noticeable thing here is that while the initial scripts seem to be finished, the Duffer brothers have decided to shut down production

title: Keychron’s Mechanical K5 Pro Keyboard Is Ideal For Spreadsheet Jockeys
description: If you need a keyboard with a numeric keyboard but don't want it taking up most of your desk, the low-profile Keychron K5 Pro is a sensible choice and a joy to type on.

title: UFC 288 Results: Aljamain Sterling Outlasts Henry Cejudo In Main Event
description: UFC men’s bantamweight champion, Aljamain Sterling successfully defended his title against Henry Cejudo on Saturday night in the main event of UFC 288.

title: Canelo Alvarez Pummels A Game, But Overmatched John Ryder
description: Canelo Alvarez successfully defended his WBO, IBF, WBA and WBC super middleweight titles and bounced back from the second loss of his illustrious boxing career on Saturday night with a unanimous-decision win over John Ryder.
